mapper.select: SELECT RP.RP_ID , RP.PRNT_RP_ID , RP.EML RP_EML , RP.WRT_DT , RP.IS_DLT , RP.GL_ID , RP.IS_ADVC , RP.DTL , RP.IS_BLCK , RP.MNG_ID , RP.MNTN_EML , MM.EML MM_EML , MM.NM , MM.PIC_NM , MM.AUTHRTY FROM RP , MM WHERE RP.EML = MM.EML AND RP.MNG_ID = #{mongoId}

SELECT RP.RP_ID , RP.PRNT_RP_ID , RP.EML RP_EML , RP.WRT_DT , RP.IS_DLT , RP.GL_ID , RP.IS_ADVC , RP.DTL , RP.IS_BLCK , RP.MNG_ID , RP.MNTN_EML , MM.EML MM_EML , MM.NM , MM.PIC_NM , MM.AUTHRTY FROM RP , MM WHERE RP.EML = MM.EML AND RP.RP_ID = #{id}

SELECT RP.RP_ID , RP.PRNT_RP_ID , RP.EML RP_EML , RP.WRT_DT , RP.IS_DLT , RP.GL_ID , RP.IS_ADVC , RP.DTL , RP.IS_BLCK , RP.MNG_ID , RP.MNTN_EML , MM.EML MM_EML , MM.NM , MM.PIC_NM , MM.AUTHRTY FROM RP , MM WHERE RP.EML = MM.EML AND RP.GL_ID = #{goalId} AND RP.PRNT_RP_ID is null ORDER BY RP.RP_ID DESC

SELECT RP.RP_ID , RP.PRNT_RP_ID , RP.EML RP_EML , RP.WRT_DT , RP.IS_DLT , RP.GL_ID , RP.IS_ADVC , RP.DTL , RP.IS_BLCK , RP.MNG_ID , RP.MNTN_EML , MM.EML MM_EML , MM.NM , MM.PIC_NM , MM.AUTHRTY FROM RP , MM WHERE RP.EML = MM.EML AND RP.PRNT_RP_ID = #{replyId} ORDER BY RP.RP_ID
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM RP WHERE GL_ID = #{goalId} AND IS_DLT = 0 AND IS_BLCK = 0 START WITH PRNT_RP_ID is null CONNECT BY PRIOR RP_ID = PRNT_RP_ID
